com.hybris.cis.api.avs.service

Interface AddressVerificationService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    CisService
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AddressVerificationServiceMockImpl, AvalaraAvs, CybersourceAvs, KiaAvsServiceImpl, SampleAvsServiceImpl

    public interface AddressVerificationService
extends CisService
    Provides for address verification and standardization.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AvsResult verifyAddress(CisAddress address)
      Verifies an address.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.hybris.cis.api.service.CisService

        getId, getType, testConnection

    • Method Detail

      • verifyAddress

        AvsResult verifyAddress(CisAddress address)
                 throws AbstractCisServiceException

        Verifies an address.

        If there are no substantial differences between the address entered and the standardized address returned by the AVS service, an AvsResult with CisDecision.ACCEPT is returned.

        A CisDecision.REVIEW indicates that the address entered was corrected.

        If an address cannot be verified, the decision results in CisDecision.REJECT.

        Details about corrections or errors may be found in AvsResult.getFieldErrors() depending on the 3rd party service capabilities.

        Parameters:
        address - The address to validate
        Returns:
        The address verification result
        Throws:
        AbstractCisServiceException - If the address cannot be verified due to exceptions (see AbstractCisServiceException subclasses for details).
